Fresh Produce

Delivered right to your door
straight from local farms.

Browse ProduceCheck Avaliability in your area

Connecting
Whatcom County
With local farmers.

Farm to Door was created to bridge the gap between you and the farmers in Whatcom County. Located in Bellingham, Washington, we aim to provide you with the freshest produce and farmers with a direct customer base. Order fruits and vegetables when they are in season and have them delivered to your door within hours, or subscribe to produce of your choice and have it delivered to you regularly.

Get a random assortment of seasonal produce delivered to you regularly!

Just a note, This website does not work properly on Internet Explorer yet. However, it works on all other major modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, etc), including smartphones.


The shopping cart is powered by Shopify's api. This is a developer store, so you can checkout, but it won't let you get past the address part.


Copyright information and a link to the code (github repository) can be found in the "About" section.
